hadiths.text: The aforesaid tradition has also been narrated by ‘Umar bin Ya’la through a different chain of narrators, like the tradition of ring. Sufyan, a narrator, was asked How do you pay zakat on it. He said You may combine it with other (ornaments)

chapter.ara-name: باب الْكَنْزِ مَا هُوَ وَزَكَاةِ الْحُلِيِّ
chapter.eng-name: On The Meaning Of Kanz (Treasure) And Zakat On Jewellery
